Unleash your story
hero.subheadline: Custom tattoos and piercings crafted in the shadows of midnight artistry
hero.imageAlt: Dark artistic tattoo work at Midnight Tattoo and Pierce

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story in shadows and light

sessions.subtitle: Choose your journey into darkness
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your deposit back

testimonials.quote: Alex's dark art style is absolutely incredible. The detail in my blackwork sleeve is beyond what I imagined. The midnight atmosphere made the experience even more special.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: Best tattoo experience I've ever had. The studio's vibe is perfect for getting dark art done. Professional, clean, and the artwork speaks for itself.
testimonials.author: James R.

paragraphs: Alex Noir has been creating dark art tattoos for over 8 years, specializing in blackwork, gothic designs, and intricate shadow play. What started as a fascination with the beauty found in darkness has evolved into a signature style that captures the mysterious and the profound.

At Midnight Tattoo and Pierce, every piece is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and a deep understanding of how shadows and light can tell powerful stories on skin. The studio operates with a philosophy that great art emerges from the depths of creativity, often found in the quiet hours of midnight.
about.callout: Every tattoo is a journey into the beautiful darkness of your story
about.imageAlt: Alex Noir, tattoo artist at Midnight Tattoo and Pierce

items.question: Do you specialize in dark art styles?
items.answer: Yes, we specialize in blackwork, gothic designs, dark realism, and shadow-heavy pieces. Our artist Alex has developed a signature style that embraces the darker aesthetic while maintaining incredible detail and artistry.

items.question: Do you offer late-night appointments?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer evening and late-night sessions by appointment. Many clients find the midnight atmosphere perfect for getting their dark art pieces done. Contact us to schedule your preferred time.

booking.modalDescription: Ready to create your dark masterpiece? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss your vision.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your design and confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your booking

contact.address: 123 Shadow Lane, Dark District, Manchester M1 2AB
